data.name: FOX_CHILLINTALES_T17_006_0
data.text: MY GRANDFATHER, STEENIE, FOR- TIFIED HIMSELF WITH BRANDY AND MAKE HIS WAY HOME THROUGH THE DARK WOODS OF HAUNTED PITMURKIE...

data.name: FOX_CHILLINTALES_T17_006_1
data.text: AYE! I AM LOST! MY HOME WILL BE TAKEN-- WOE IS ME!

data.name: FOX_CHILLINTALES_T17_006_2
data.text:
SUDDENLY, FROM A DARK THICKET, A STRANGER STEPPED BEFORE
                HIM...

data.name: FOX_CHILLINTALES_T17_006_4
data.text: STEENIE, I HAVE BEEN LOOKING FOR YOU.

data.name: FOX_CHILLINTALES_T17_006_5
data.text: ME? WHAT ON AIRTH CAN YE WANT WITH ME?

data.name: FOX_CHILLINTALES_T17_006_6
data.text: THE AULD LAIRD IS DISTURBED IN HIS GRAVE BY YOUR CURSES! IF YE DARE VEN- TURE TO GO AND SEE HIM, HE WILL GIVE YOU THE RECEIPT.

data.name: FOX_CHILLINTALES_T17_006_7
data.text: I HAVE THE COURAGE TO GO TO THE GATES OF HELL, AND A STEPFARTHER, FOR THAT RECEIPT.

data.name: FOX_CHILLINTALES_T17_006_8
data.text: HA HA HA THEN COME WITH ME, STEENIE STEENSON!

data.name: FOX_CHILLINTALES_T17_006_9
data.text:
AND SO STEENIE WENT WITH THE MAN AND THEY SOON CAME TO THE DOOR OF A GRIM
                CASTLE...

data.name: FOX_CHILLINTALES_T17_006_10
data.text: STRANGE... IF I DIDN'T KNOW IT WAS A FULL TWELVE MILES AWAY, I'D SWEAR IT WAS THE OLD PORTICOES OF REDGAUNTLET CASTLE... CAN I BE DREAMING?

data.name: FOX_CHILLINTALES_T17_006_11
data.text: THE DOOR OPENED AND THEY WERE GREETED BY NONE OTHER THAN DOUGAL...

data.name: FOX_CHILLINTALES_T17_006_12
data.text: DOUGAL MAC CALLUM, I THOUGHT YE BE DEAD!

data.name: FOX_CHILLINTALES_T17_006_13
data.text: FORGET ABOUT ME AND LISTEN WELL TO WHAT I HAVE TO SAY.
